entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
